Title: Arioch Cain (No. 50)
Writer: Jon Bokenkamp (created by), Dawn DeNoon, Brandon Sonnier (executive story editor), Brandon Margolis (executive story editor)
Actors: James Spader, Megan Boone, Diego Klattenhoff, Ryan Eggold
Plot: Red and the FBI come together to protect Liz when a huge reward for her capture attracts attention from assassins.
